cause.description:
Are you bored of naf sports like Cricket and Soccer?
Who wants to kick a piece of pig skin around a field, when you could be ripping it up on your bike?
Why throw a ball at someone when you can blat him with a paintball?
Show your support for Extremely South African by joining this worthwhile cause. Get all your friends to join!!!
We aim to expose all the great companies behind the sports and have created as advertising program to get the companies name out there. We've also created a platform for the public to find information on their sports of choice.
We feature Extreme Sports related News, Directory, Forums and more!
Go to http://www.extremelysa.co.za for more info!
1. Adrenaline keeps you ALIVE!
2. South Africa is the most awesome country in the world with Adventure at our finger tips!
cause.mission: Promote Adventure Sports in South Africa
cause.name: Support Extreme Sports in S.A. (http://www.extremelysa.co.za)
